alert.note: Alert for Lower Brewster County; Pecos; Terrell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 7:44PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pecos, eastern Brewster and Terrell Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 744 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 25 miles northwest of Terrell County Gas Plant, or 26 miles southwest of Sheffield, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sheffield, Sanderson, Dryden, Terrell County Gas Plant and Terrell County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Texas.
